title: Calories in Cotton Candy Grapes
meta_description: Discover calories in cotton candy grapes per 100g, including carbs, sugars, fiber, protein, fat, and quick nutrition facts for this sweet hybrid variety.
assumptions: Fresh, seedless cotton candy grapes (green hybrid variety); values similar to standard green grapes with higher natural sweetness.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by ripeness, growing conditions, brand, and storage; check labels or databases for exact values when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of cotton candy grapes provides ~69 kcal, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Frozen cotton candy grapes (no added sugar)
Compared to red grapes (slightly lower sugar)

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g cotton candy grapes?
Are cotton candy grapes high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, ~15.5g sugars per 100g due to their candy-like flavor.

faqs.q: What's the protein in cotton candy grapes?
faqs.a: Low at 0.7g per 100g; they're mostly carbs from natural sugars.

faqs.q: Do cotton candy grapes have fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, about 0.9g fiber per 100g, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: How do cotton candy grapes compare to regular grapes calorically?
faqs.a: Similar at ~69 kcal per 100g; the flavor comes from breeding, not added sugar.
